item.title: From WINNIPEG to WUHAN: How Trudeau's Canada is at the Heart of the Global Plandemic [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ March 14, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew dive deep into two MASSIVE SCANDALS -Winnipeg Lab Leak & ArriveCan APP- both of which implicate the Trudeau Regime of massive corruption and incompetence, both of which they are trying to cover up. TUNE IN TO HEAR WHAT THE TRUDEAU-FUNDED MSM WON'T TELL YOU.

[Segment 1] - The Scientist - The Winnipeg Virologist Connected to Carona Virus Gain-of-Function and Lab Leak:
Lab Leak Story by Shiela Gunn Reid | Rebel News Online: https://twitter.com/RebelNewsOnline/status/1767346546763547100;
Winnipeg lab firing documents released | CBC News: https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/winnipeg-lab-firing-documents-released-china-1.7128865;

[Segment 2] - The Cover-up:
Trudeau govt virologists who transferred Ebola to Wuhan had clandestine relationship with Chinese | Zero Hedge: https://www.zerohedge.com/political/trudeau-govt-virologists-who-transferred-ebola-wuhan-had-clandestine-relationship-chinese;
Liberals, NDP shut down committee probing fired scientists | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/liberals-ndp-shut-down-committee-probing-fired-scientists?taid=65e6487672a63d00014ba003;
Liberals, NDP shut down investigation into Winnipeg lab | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/03/04/liberals-ndp-shut-investigation-winnipeg-lab2;

[Segment 3] - ArriveSCAM:
Auditor General of Canada | Office of the Auditor General: https://www.oag-bvg.gc.ca/internet/English/parl_oag_202402_01_e_44428.html;
Accountants afraid to speak | Blacklock's Reporter: https://www.blacklocks.ca/accountants-afraid-to-speak;
RCMP investigates Trudeau’s $60 million ArriveCAN boondoggle | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/rcmp-investigates-trudeaus-60-million-arrivecan-boondoggle?utm_content=;
Companies tied to ArriveCAN scandal banned from bidding on federal contracts | CTV News: https://www.ctvnews.ca/politics/companies-tied-to-arrivecan-scandal-banned-from-bidding-on-federal-contracts-1.6796927;

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 03/12/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ March 12, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

Episode Resources:
"Guilbeault says measures will be taken after Saskatchewan refuses to collect carbon tax" | Rebel News | https://www.rebelnews.com/guilbeault_says_measures_will_be_taken_after_saskatchewan_refuses_to_collect_carbon_tax;
"Saskatchewan no longer send carbon funds" | TNC News | https://tnc.news/2024/03/01/saskatchewan-no-longer-send-carbon-funds;
"Liberals considered upping immigration" | TNC News | https://tnc.news/2024/03/11/liberals-considered-upping-immigration;
"NDP faces backlash motion Palestinian statehood" | TNC News | https://tnc.news/2024/03/12/ndp-faces-backlash-motion-palestinian-statehood;
"Ontario university holds gym hours segregated by gender, sexuality" | Western Standard | https://www.westernstandard.news/canadian/ontario-university-holds-gym-hours-segregated-by-gender-sexuality/53052;
"Campus Watch: Queen's University Palestinian flag" | TNC News | https://tnc.news/2024/03/11/campus-watch-queens-university-palestinian-flag;
"CBC hands out $15 million in bonuses despite laying off hundreds of staff" | Western Standard | https://www.westernstandard.news/news/cbc-hands-out-15-million-in-bonuses-despite-laying-off-hundreds-of-staff/53043;
"Distraught Calgary dad wants judicial review of daughter's MAID application" | Western Standard | https://www.westernstandard.news/alberta/distraught-calgary-dad-wants-judicial-review-of-daughters-maid-application/53035.

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 03/07/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ March 07, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

[Segment 1] - COVID Fallout Continues...AGAIN:
"9 Ont. nurses fired for refusing COVID vaccines should be reinstated, arbitrator rules" | CTV News | https://www.ctvnews.ca/health/9-ont-nurses-fired-for-refusing-covid-vaccines-should-be-reinstated-arbitrator-rules-1.6795363;
"Unvaccinated marginalized 'far-right'" | True North | https://tnc.news/2024/02/28/unvaccinated-marginalized-far-right;
"Exclusive: Health Canada official says politicians pressured him on COVID vaccine approvals" | Lioness of Judah | https://lionessofjudah.substack.com/p/exclusive-health-canada-official;
"COVID-19 may have been created by scientists in Wuhan lab: Professor" | Toronto Sun | https://torontosun.com/news/world/covid-19-may-have-been-created-by-scientists-in-wuhan-lab-professor;
"CDC announces new COVID-19 recommendations for isolation, masks, and tests" | CBS News | https://www.cbsnews.com/news/cdc-covid-recommendations-isolation-masks-tests;

[Segment 2] - A Woke Win at X (formerly a free-speech platform, formerly Twitter):
"Twitter reinstates its policy against misgendering and deadnaming users" | PCMag | https://www.pcmag.com/news/twitter-reinstates-its-policy-against-misgendering-and-deadnaming-users;
"Woman thrown out of Ontario city council meeting for raising concerns on universal gender-neutral common area" | The Post Millennial | https://thepostmillennial.com/woman-thrown-out-of-ontario-city-council-meeting-for-raising-concerns-on-universal-gender-neutral-common-area;
"Alberta town bans pride crosswalks, flags" | True North | https://tnc.news/2024/02/23/alberta-town-bans-pride-crosswalks-flags;

[Segment 3] -Canada Continues to Spend Money it Doesn't Have on Things it Doesn't Need:
"Trudeau sending another $3 billion to Ukraine, including $4 million for gender and diversity" | The Post Millennial | https://thepostmillennial.com/trudeau-sending-another-3-billion-to-ukraine-including-4-million-for-gender-and-diversity;
"Canada announces additional support for Ukraine" | Office of the Prime Minister | [https://www.pm.gc.ca/en/news/backgrounders/2024/02/24/canada-announces-additional-support-ukraine.
